description:
We are looking for an innovative, creative and insatiably curious Head of Investor relations to join our growing team in Hong Kong.

Position Objective

The role is to support the CEO and CFO to develop and drive Investor Relations strategy and initiatives for LELO.

Roles and Responsibilities

Develops IR strategy in conjunction with the CEO and CFO
Handles disclosures and prepares presentation materials for communicating key results to potential investors and research analysts
Supports the collection and analysis of investors' and analysts' perceptions and opinions of the company, and share ownership information.
Supports the development of the company’s investor relations website and makes periodic updates as needed.
Facilitates a strong understanding of the current market and industry by compiling and distributing up-to-date market developments and opinions.
Performs research and analysis of industry, peers and competitors’ financial statements, operational statistics and valuation, including the development and maintenance of financial models relating to the company.
Conducts and analyzes industry and peer research, and conveys relevant findings in a timely and concise manner.
Monitors and analyzes data relating to trading activity, relative stock price movements of the company and industry peers.
Other ad hoc IR projects

 Key Performance Indicators

Accurately presenting company information to investors, research analysts and investment community
Timely and accurate periodic reports on comparable sell-side research summary
Timely reporting of latest industry and market news to team and management
Developing and maintaining financial model of the company
Effective handling of ad-hoc IR projects

  Job Requirements

With 8-10 years of relevant experience, managing the IR processes for a sizable and active listed company.
Financial & quantitative analysis skills. Demonstrated financial acumen with strong financial background; ability to understand and interpret financial results; strong analytical, problem solving and critical thinking skills.
Proficient in developing and maintaining relationships with internal and external contacts which inspire confidence, trust and respect.
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and adapt to a variety of business needs
Strong communications and presentation skills, both written and verbal.
Strong interpersonal skills and ability to work well in cross-functional teams.
Strong written and spoken English
A team player, ability to deliver, meet deadlines, and have results orientation.

 Qualifications

University graduate with a major in business administration, finance, economic or related disciplines.

 About LELO

The brand that would become LELO started in 2003, in the front room of a Stockholm townhouse, where three designers coalesced at exactly the right place at exactly the right time, with exactly the right idea. It was an idea that would eventually reshape and transcend the confines of an entire industry, and it began with a simple question: What if our most intimate items were made as beautiful as the ones we displayed with the most pride?

Now in our second decade of producing the most refined, most luxurious and most iconic objects of desire in the world, LELO has established a heritage based on quality, on unexpected innovation and on being entirely different from everything and everyone else.

We are a brand of many subtle shades, and what we actually do goes far beyond what we physically create. LELO is driven by an insatiable curiosity, a desire to explore and refine the space where digital technology and human sensation intersect. That’s what makes us unique, different, and uniquely different.

Our uniqueness is rooted in our design-led approach to our products. We have an intrinsic and instantly recognizable design DNA; principles which inform all of our creations from start to finish and which evolve over time to stay ahead of the tide. This means that we, like no other brand, can offer our customers new sensations before they even know they want them. How do we do that? By always looking beyond ourselves, beyond our products and beyond our industry.

What we do is look for unexplored spaces and chances to improve on the current landscape of sensuality. It’s exciting when we find such an opportunity and know we can address it, and we believe that sense of curiosity and excitement translates seamlessly into our finished products.

We’ve come a long way from that Stockholm townhouse. Today, we have offices across the world, from Shanghai to San Jose, but our heart and soul are still firmly in Sweden. And everything that we’ve accomplished so far is due to the innovation of our award-winning products.
